name: Projekt Harvester (namesBlue)
description:
Projekt Harvester Description

Demo for Ludum Dare 52 with a theme-Harvester.

Upgrade your farm from scratch, add more robots, expand, make more profits! Create a farm that can auto harvest everything so you can go on a vacation!
